vision.line: Amplifying Strength in Our Voices as One EDGE2021
vision.desc: An EDGE2021 CED that sees strength in our voices. Empowering aspiring students to take a stand as individuals and as one. Taking a stand as one batch, for the people. Furthermore, to create a unified batch, we should hone each other to our greatest potential through our voices, this will commence  our journey to progress as one CED.

creds: Public Affairs Department Head of The Sophrpsyne Movement
Externals Department Core of The Graciella Collective
Bukas Loob Sa Diyos Committee Head
Former Vice President, Our Lady of Perpetual Succor College
Former Member, MCHS First Aid Club
Volunteer Teacher, Tulong Aral Sa Kapatid
Former OJT Trainee, National Parks Development Committee, Rizal Park

spoa.title: This Is What We CED
spoa.desc: This Is What We CED is a year-long project that centers around the batch’s advocacies and passions. This podcast series will provide the students with the opportunity to have open and comprehensive discussions regarding the assigned topic with the esteemed speakers. The podcasts will be uploaded monthly and each month will have it’s own designated topic.

spoa.title: TransformED
spoa.desc: TransformED is a wellness workshop that aims to promote holistic and personal development through prioritizing the student’s overall well-being. This project will tackle various components that will help them ease stress while reinventing themselves in the process. Each month will have its very own specific skill or topic, the variety of the topics ranges from showcasing their talents and skills, how to improve one's self, or simply providing support to one another.

spoa.title: Ready, CED, Go!
spoa.desc: Ready, CED, Go! is a project that calls for ID 121 CED volunteers that will take action by being proactive through providing help and service during trying times. This committee will initiate donation drives, relief operations, and the like with the assistance of the batch unit.

spoa.title: BondED
spoa.desc: Given the online setting, it is quite challenging to build a genuine connection within our batch. In order to combat this barrier, BondED aims to strengthen the unity amongst the batch through termly bonding sessions. Each bonding session will have a different theme and program . This will be executed through recreational activities through game night, movie night, and recreational activities that will include awards that shall be given by the batch unit at the end of the night.

spoa.title: NavigatED
spoa.desc: NavigatED is a project that aims to make student life easier by providing them with a Student Services Content Kit that includes a step by step guide regarding all the student services processes and needs. Alongside this will be a two-part webinar that will tackle as well as explain in detail on the various processes as well as  how to navigate through the kit.
